content.en: Facial kinship verification: Researchers have proposed various methods to improve kinship verification from facial images. These methods include neighborhood repulsed metric learning, prototype-based discriminative feature learning, robust similarity learning, multi-view multi-task learning, scalable similarity fusion, structured similarity fusion, discriminative deep metric learning, heterogeneous similarity learning, local large-margin multi-metric learning, adversarial similarity metric learning, deep compact similarity metric learning, weighted graph embedding-based metric learning, factor analysis-based metric learning, and binary cross-coupled discriminant analysis. These algorithms aim to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of kinship verification, which is the process of determining familial relationships based on facial features.
content.da: Ansigtsgenkendelse af slægtskab: Forskere har foreslået forskellige metoder til at forbedre genkendelsen af slægtskab ud fra ansigtsbilleder. Disse metoder omfatter neighborhood repulsed metric learning, prototypebaseret diskriminativ feature learning, robust similaritetslæring, multi-view multi-task learning, scalable similarity fusion, struktureret similaritetsfusion, diskriminativ dyb metrisk læring, heterogen similaritetslæring, lokal large-margin multi-metrisk læring, adversarial similarity metrisk læring, dyb kompakt similaritetslæring, vægtet grafindlejringsbaseret metrisk læring, faktoranalysebaseret metrisk læring og binær krydskoblet diskriminantanalyse. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af slægtskabsgenkendelse, som er processen med at bestemme familiære relationer baseret på ansigtstræk.
